definitions.definition: a bone that curves round from your back to your chest:
examples: My son broke a rib when he fell off a ladder.

definitions.definition: a piece of meat taken from this part of an animal:
examples: He cooked rib of lamb for Sunday lunch.

definitions.definition: one of the curved pieces of metal or wood that support the structure of a boat or roof
to joke and laugh at someone in a friendly way about something:
examples: His brothers ribbed him about his new girlfriend.
